title.en: A Prayer to the Great Abbot Śāntarakṣita

text.en: In devotion, I pay homage to the protector Mañjughoṣa!
text.en-trans: gönpo jampé yang la güpé chaktsal lo

text.en: Born into thesāla-like lineage of the kṣatriyas,
text.en-trans: gyalrik sala tabü gyü trung shing

text.en: You mastered the five sciences and honoured Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: rigpé né nga tarchin jamyang kyi

text.en: Offering the crown of your head for his lotus feet—
text.en-trans: zhab kyi pemö zé'u dru chiwö ten

text.en: Great bodhisattva abbot, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khenchen changchub sempar solwa deb

text.en: With your altruistic resolve formed many aeons ago
text.en-trans: kal mang gong né zhenpen tukkyé kyi

text.en: As an utterly stable foundation like finest gold,
text.en-trans: tsawa ser dram tabu rabten pé

text.en: You are the sole ally of the teachings and beings in this age of turmoil—
text.en-trans: tsödü ten dang drowé nyen chikpu

text.en: Great abbot Śāntarakṣita, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khenchen zhiwatso la solwa deb

text.en: Like a mighty skull-crushing vajra elephant, you defeated
text.en-trans: sangye ten la khuwé mutek kyi

text.en: Thetīrthikas who were hostile to the teachings of the Buddha
text.en-trans: langchen tsuk gem wangpö dorjé tar

text.en: In grammar and logic and through Middle Way reasoning —
text.en-trans: dratsé umé rikpé chom dzepé

text.en: Great lion of speech, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: mawé sengé chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Upon the foundation of Vinaya teachings, like a golden mountain,
text.en-trans: chö dul ser gyi riwor ten ché shing

text.en: You fully elucidated the meaning of the Sūtras, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zab ching gyaché dodé dön rabsal

text.en: And beheld the ocean-like Abhidharma as if with a thousand eyes—
text.en-trans: chö ngön gyatsö chen tong nampar tra

text.en: Great abbot, guru to the gods, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khenchen lha yi lamar solwa deb

text.en: The sweet scent of your discipline delighted all including the devas,
text.en-trans: tsultrim dri yi lhar ché dro nam ga

text.en: Your profound meditative absorption brought undefiled qualities,
text.en-trans: tingdzin zab mö zakmé yönten dü

text.en: And your wisdom and courageous eloquence opened a hundred Dharma doors—
text.en-trans: sherab pobpé chö kyi go gya jé

text.en: Second lord of sages for this world of Jambudvīpa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dzamling tubwang nyipar solwa deb

text.en: You brought the chariot of the teachings of the Śākya Lion
text.en-trans: jangchok gangri trengwé korwé jong

text.en: To this northern land encircled by a chain of snowy peaks,
text.en-trans: shakya sengé tenpé shingta dren

text.en: So that we may readily avail ourselves of the Three Piṭakas—
text.en-trans: denö sum la chi gar longchö pé

text.en: Lord of unparalleled kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: kadrin nyammé jé la solwa deb

text.en: To the abbot prophesied by the victorious buddha,
text.en-trans: gyalwé lung gi tenpé khenpo ni

text.en: Bodhisattva Śāntarakṣita,
text.en-trans: bhodhi sato shanta rakshi ta

text.en: Omniscient in actuality, great regent of the Teacher,
text.en-trans: tamché khyen ngö tönpé gyaltsab cher

text.en: With single-pointed faith and devotion, I pray.
text.en-trans: dé mö tsechik güpé solwa deb

text.en: As I pray to you—not with empty mouthing but from the depths of my heart,
text.en-trans: kha tsam mayin nying né soldeb na

text.en: Grant your blessings so that the precious teachings spread in all directions,
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen chok chur pelwa dang

text.en: Everywhere is flooded with ocean-like communities of the ethical,
text.en-trans: tsulden düpa gyatsö yong gang zhing

text.en: And my three doors of body, speech and mind are made utterly pure.
text.en-trans: go sum nampar dakpar jingyi lob
